name: Apple & Worm's Day Out
description:
{home is wherever you are cozy}

Fuji Apple and her soft-spoken pal Worm have a long outing ahead of them. There are lots of errands to run in Wayward Valley before the day is out: breads to bake, jams to jar, flowers to harvest, and...a lovely lady to woo?! Grab a friend and a controller, this cozy collection of micro-stories and minigames will give you the warmest of fuzzies!

{current status: demo release -- significant content updates to come!}

Controls:

A/D = move left/right (Player 1)

H/K = move left/right (Player 2)

W/S = move selection cursor up/down on menu

G/; = select menu option, advance through text in conversation box

For the best play experience:

  1. launch game in your browser & wait for the Unity bar to load
  2. scroll down until you see the square blue full-screen button & click
  3. the game should now fill your computer screen at the best resolution!
  4. press "ESC" to exit full-screen mode at any time

COMING SOON:

  • public VRChat "pocket gallery" world feat. Apple & Worm
  • "home is a pocket-sized place" -- promo video with developer commentary
